pages.text: $(li)The Illager Tower is where the Illager King Lives.$(br)$(li)You should investigate every floor, who knows, maybe you can find interesting loot there.$(br)$(li)Be careful, the Archers, Furanturs, Enchanters will be prepared to defend their King from intruders.
$(li)The Illager Tower can be found in the Forest, Jungle, Mushroom Forest, Plains, Savanna and Swamp biomes.
